channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Real-Life Pokémon Pinball Is the Most Visceral Way to Catch ‘Em All
item.description: You'll have to pay a hefty chunk of change for Stern Pinball's version of the classic Game Boy game.

item.title: Qarabag vs Newcastle Free Streams: How to watch Champions League 2025/26 1st leg from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch Qarabag vs Newcastle live streams from anywhere and for free, as the minnows look to upset the Magpies in this Champions League 1st leg match.

item.title: Microsoft says Office bug exposed customers’ confidential emails to Copilot AI
item.description: Microsoft said the bug meant that its Copilot AI chatbot was reading and summarizing paying customers' confidential emails, bypassing data protection policies.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem sort très bientôt et voici où le précommander au plus bas prix sur PS5
item.description: Resident Evil Requiem est le 9e opus canonique de la célèbre franchise horrifique de Capcom. Disponible sur toutes les plateformes à partir du 27 février 2026, vous pouvez le précommander dès aujourd'hui pour 53,72 euros au lieu de 79,99 euros.

item.title: Polestar unveils a station wagon version of the 4
item.description: Polestar is gearing up to launch three new models in the next two years, including a station wagon (estate or shooting brake) version of the Polestar 4 that harkens back to the company's Volvo roots. The Geely-owned Swedish company sold a record 61,000 EVs in 2025, but hopes that the new models will help it take an even bigger bite out of the market. "We want to get more volume out of a bigger cake," CEO Michael Lohscheller said. Polestar currently offers two models in the US, the Polestar 3 and Polestar 4, both SUVs. However, the new Polestar 4 will come in two variants, one a traditional SU...

item.title: Nothing Phone (4a) : une mauvaise nouvelle à en croire cette fuite
item.description: Nothing présentera très prochainement son Nothing Phone (4a). Malheureusement, la facture serait plus salée cette année.

item.title: OpenAI pushes into higher education as India seeks to scale AI skills
item.description: OpenAI says its India education partnerships aim to reach more than 100,000 students, faculty and staff over the next year.

item.title: 'A spectacularly bad idea' — Digital rights advocates call on Wisconsin lawmakers to reject VPN ban bill
item.description: Wisconsin's controversial age verification proposal is expected to be discussed today (February 18). The Electronic Frontier Foundation warns that provisions to block VPN users are "unworkable."

item.title: Les secrets de la Chine pour produire ses voitures 40 % moins cher qu’en Europe révélé par ce rapport officiel
item.description: C’est un document qui a l’effet d’une douche froide pour l'Europe. Un rapport officiel français met des chiffres précis sur ce que tout le monde pressentait : la Chine produit ses voitures électriques à des coûts qui défient toute concurrence occidentale. Et on sait désormais comment cela est possible, et ce qu'il faut faire pour s'en protéger.

item.title: Les Nothing Phone (4a) et (4a) Pro seraient un peu mieux équipés, mais ils coûteraient aussi beaucoup plus cher
item.description: Chose promise, chose due (hélas) : les futurs smartphones de Nothing subiront bien une hausse de leurs prix, d'après un fuiteur très fiable. Pas de surprise ici puisque Carl Pei, le patron du constructeur, avait préparé les esprits début janvier.

item.title: A simple hack gave the owner of a brand-new DJI Romo access to a global army of robovacs
item.description: Robovac user gets a lot more than he bargained for after connecting his PS5 controller to a DJI Romo.

item.title: Votre montre Garmin va s’améliorer : cette mise à jour majeure déploie de nouvelles fonctionnalités très attendues
item.description: Garmin a lancé le déploiement d'une mise à jour conséquente pour ses montres haut de gamme Fenix 8, Fenix 8 Pro, Enduro 3 et Fenix E, avec de nouvelles fonctions liées au poids, à la batterie ou à l'heure de coucher.

item.title: iOS 26.4 will bring these 5 upgrades to your iPhone, but there’s still no sign of the new Siri
item.description: The iOS 26.4 beta has plenty of new features, but the new Apple Intelligence-powered Siri isn’t one of them.

item.title: A worrying Dell zero-day flaw has reportedly gone unpatched for nearly two years - and Chinese hackers are taking advantage
item.description: Login credentials were left hardcoded in a tool, which went undetected for more than a year.

item.title: NordVPN deal: Get two years of the Complete plan for 70 percent off
item.description:
NordVPN is offering a significant discount on its two-year plans, with 70 percent off its Complete tier and up to 74 percent off overall. For the Complete tier, the deal brings the total cost down to $130 for 24 months. NordVPN regularly appears on Engadget’s list of the best VPN services thanks to its wide server network, strong security tools and consistent performance across devices. NordVPN’s latest promotion puts one of its most comprehensive plans at a price that undercuts many competing premium VPN subscriptions.
The Complete tier includes full access to NordVPN’s core VPN service, wh...

item.title: Chris Hemsworth Has High Hopes for Thor’s MCU Future
item.description: Plus, Keith David promises his presidential 'Rick and Morty' spinoff is still coming this year.

item.title: Canva gets to $4B in revenue as LLM referral traffic rises
item.description: The creative company's monthly active users increased 20%, growth that was partially propelled by adoption of its AI tools.

item.title: World Labs lands $200M from Autodesk to bring world models into 3D workflows
item.description: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a focus on entertainment use cases.

item.title: I tested GHD's pricey new hair dryer against Dyson's Supersonic – and for ultra-fast drying, there was one clear winner
item.description: If you want to splash out on a premium hair dryer, Dyson and GHD are both well worth considering. Here's how their top models compare.

item.title: How to Make a Killing review: Glen Powell stars in A24s eat-the-rich comedy
item.description: Margaret Qualley, Jessica Henwick, and Ed Harris co-star in John Patton Ford's follow-up to "Emily the Criminal," "How to Make a Killing" with Glen Powell. Review.

item.title: Boîte de réception | TikTok l’addictif, l’itinérance sécurisée et l’IA pour vos finances
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on se penche sur la dépendance créée par TikTok, on compare WiFi et cellulaire en itinérance, et on se demande si l’IA est un bon conseiller financier.

item.title: Can't wait for the God of War Trilogy remake? Me neither — here are the best books, games, and merch to help tide you over
item.description: If the God of War Trilogy remake announcement has got you thirsty for more from the series, then these God of War games, books, and bits of merch will hit the spot.

item.title: LG Gram 17 Ultra 7 : -250 € sur ce laptop poids plume avec un écran géant de 17 pouces
item.description: Un laptop fin et léger, sans pour autant sacrifier les performances, voilà ce que propose LG avec son laptop Gram 17Z90S. Il embarque un processeur Intel Core Ultra 7 solide et efficace pour les tâches du quotidien et se trouve en ce moment en promotion à 1 099 euros contre 1 399 euros de base.

item.title: « Nous sommes trop proches du but pour renoncer » : face à la crise, ACC brise le silence et avoue les problèmes de production
item.description: Alors qu’il traverse une période particulièrement difficile, le géant tricolore des batteries ACC s’exprime sur le sujet. Et il rappelle l’importance d’une production européenne pour les voitures électriques.

item.title: Grab 8 Pokemon TCG: Phantasmal Flames booster packs at a new low price on Amazon — save $20
item.description: Eight-pack Pokémon TCG: Phantasmal Flames boosters fall to $69.98 at Amazon, just $8.74 per pack after a 22% discount.

item.title: Fiverr stock price is collapsing today as the freelancer platform tries to put a positive spin on AI disruption
item.description: CEO Micha Kaufman argues that the company is in a unique position to capitalize on AI transformation. Investors seem to disagree. Shares of Fiverr International Ltd. (NYSE: FVRR) are dropping significantly this morning after the freelance marketplace platform reported its Q4 2025 financial results.

item.title: Get $80 off Sonos Ace headphones at Amazon — act fast to score this limited-time discount
item.description: As of Feb. 18, the black Sonos Ace headphones have dropped to $319 at Amazon, 20% off their list price of $399.

item.title: No, the Final Fantasy 9 Remake hasn't been officially announced — but don't give up hope just yet
item.description: Despite the online rumors, there's no Final Fantasy 9 Remake news — but I remain optimistic.

item.title: Snakes Resort to Cannibalism When the Opportunity Strikes, Study Shows
item.description: It's a snake-eat-snake world.

item.title: Audible’s Read and Listen feature is a handy and accessible new audiobook tool, but it comes with a catch that’s quite back-handed for book lovers
item.description: Audible's new Read and Listen tool lets you follow your favorite audiobooks using synchronized text.

item.title: Audible launches Read & Listen, allowing you to follow along with your audiobook
item.description: On Feb. 18, 2026, Audible launches the Read & Listen mode within its app. Previously available in the Kindle app, Read & Listen lets you follow the text while listening to the audiobook.

item.title: How to watch Love Island: All Stars online for free
item.description: How to watch Love Island: All Stars for free. Live stream Love Island: All Stars in 2026 for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: New users can get one year of access to Monarch Money for 50 percent off
item.description: A good budgeting app can make it much easier to see where your money is actually going, and one of our top picks is 50 percent off right now. Monarch Money is running a deal for new users that cuts the price of its annual plan in half. With the code MONARCHVIP, you’ll pay $50 for one year of access instead of the usual $100. We’ve recommended Monarch before for its deep customization options and robust financial planning tools. It supports unlimited account connections, investment tracking and shared budgets, making it a solid option if you want a detailed look at your finances or plan alongsi...

item.title: Liquid Web vs ScalaHosting: VPS hosting compared
item.description: Liquid Web vs ScalaHosting: VPS hosting compared

item.title: Il n’y aura finalement pas de pub dans Perplexity
item.description: Il n'y aura pas de pub dans les résultats de Perplexity. L'assistant de recherche avait pourtant lancé très tôt, dès 2024, un programme pilote pour tester l'affichage de bandeaux de publicité. Mais il est désormais à l'abandon : une question de confiance avec les utilisateurs, tranche la start-up. Transmis à OpenAI, qui vient de lancer la réclame dans ChatGPT…...

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones pas chers (à moins de 200 €) en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous êtes à la recherche d'un téléphone à moins de 200 euros ? Sur Frandroid, nous testons des smartphones de toutes sortes à tous les prix : voici donc nos recommandations des meilleurs téléphones portables pas chers, à moins de 200 euros.

item.title: How to watch Canada vs. Czechia in mens ice hockey online for free
item.description: How to watch ice hockey for free. Live stream Canada vs. Czechia in men's ice hockey for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: 'AI is making us able to develop software at the speed of light': Mistral CEO claims more than 50% of enterprise software could soon switch to AI
item.description: Traditional apps could be replaced by AI, but only if enterprises have the "right infrastructure in place" first.

item.title: India’s Sarvam wants to bring its AI models to feature phones, cars and smart glasses
item.description: The company is using edge models that take up only megabytes of space, can run on most phones with existing processors, and can work offline.

item.title: Proton VPN kills OpenVPN support on Android — here’s why that’s a good thing
item.description: Proton VPN has officially removed the OpenVPN protocol from its Android app, citing "bloat" and superior alternatives like WireGuard. Here is what you need to know.

item.title: ‘Badlands’ Almost Had Even Bigger Links to the Other ‘Predator’ and ‘Alien’ Movies
item.description: There's a sly cameo from Naru from 'Prey,' but originally it didn't stop there.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg is taking the stand as social media goes on trial
item.description: Lori Schott didn't care what it took to haul her way from her small town in Eastern Colorado to show up to a Los Angeles courtroom where Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is set to testify Wednesday. "I don't care if I had to hire a pack mule to get me here, I was going to […]

item.title: Heron Power raises $140M to ramp production of grid-altering tech
item.description: Tesla alumni Drew Baglino raises a large round to build a giga-scale factory, this time at his own startup.

item.title: Vie numérique | Comment l’IA peut libérer votre génie musical
item.description: L’intelligence artificielle (IA) générative signe-t-elle le début de la fin de la créativité humaine dans le secteur musical ? Des sites comme Suno et Udio font craindre le pire : ils peuvent générer des chansons entières à partir d’une simple phrase descriptive. Mais l’IA peut aussi aider les amateurs de musique à devenir plus créatifs. Il suffit de trouver les bons outils....

item.title: J’ai essayé la nouvelle Dacia Spring : la voiture électrique la moins chère de France est-elle toujours trop chère pour ce qu’elle propose ?
item.description: Nouveau moteur, nouvelle batterie et toujours la voiture électrique la moins chère de France en prix de façade avec la Leapmotor T03 qui singe ses tarifs. Voici ce que propose Dacia avec le millésime 2026 de la Spring. Face à une concurrence plus polyvalente et qui se rapproche dangereusement de ses prix, la citadine franco-roumaine doit se remettre à la page pour ne pas être finalement trop chère par rapport à ce qu'elle propose. Pari réussi ? ...

item.title: Indian AI lab Sarvam’s new models are a major bet on the viability of open-source AI
item.description: The new lineup includes 30-billion and 105-billion parameter models; a text-to-speech model; a speech-to-text model; and a vision model to parse documents.
